- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are out of fuel
- Make sure to provide fuel to entities that are out of fuel, such as burner mining drills and boilers.

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that entities waiting for source items, such as burner inserters, have access to the necessary items.

### Errors when entities are not connected
- Verify that entities that require connections, such as steam engines, are properly connected to other entities.

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Confirm that entities that require an electric network connection, such as electricity groups, are properly plugged in.

### Errors when pipe groups are empty
- Check that pipe groups have a sufficient supply of fluids to operate effectively.

### Errors when belt groups are empty
- Ensure that belt groups have a sufficient supply of items to operate effectively.


# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or important variables have been defined or assigned in the provided execution logs.
